entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 44 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning. Wind chill minus 59 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
